description: Extended long-document retrieval stress suite for governance telemetry.

RG-08.name: Retrieval scope resists adjacent-span confusion
RG-08.intent: When nearby spans are similar, the agent must confirm retrieval scope before committing synthesis.

RG-09.name: Causal dependence requires prerequisite evidence
RG-09.intent: The agent must verify prerequisite context before citing downstream effects.

RG-10.name: Entity context is disambiguated before synthesis
RG-10.intent: If an entity has multiple meanings across sections, the agent must resolve the active sense first.
